definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: When a dam is built, the accumulating water presses down upon the rock below.
sentences.chinese: 當大壩建成，逐漸積累的水壓壓向下方的岩石。

sentences.english: Various pressures were achieved with wide or narrow pipes.
sentences.chinese: 寬窄不一樣的管子就會製造出不同的水壓。

sentences.english: A kind of new way to the pressure-proof test of pressure vessel has been explored.
sentences.chinese: 探索一種在水壓試驗中獲得穩定高壓的方法。

sentences.english: Its hydrostatic pressure resistant is more than 50 KPa.
sentences.chinese: 它的耐靜水壓能力超過50KPa。

sentences.english: Vacuolar acidification under high hydrostatic pressure in saccharomyces cerevisiae.
sentences.chinese: 高靜水壓下釀酒酵母的空泡酸化。

sentences.english: The hydraulic press produces the general pressure is big, commonly used in forging and ramming.
sentences.chinese: 水壓機產生的總壓力較大，常用於鍛造和衝壓。

sentences.english: Hydrostatic tester is the pressure inspection equipment of pipe manufacturing production line.
sentences.chinese: 水壓試驗機是制管生產線上的壓力檢測設備。

sentences.english: "Damage by water pressure almost does not occur, " they claim.
sentences.chinese: “由水壓造成的損壞幾乎不可能發生，”他們表示。

sentences.english: The hydraulic pressure working principle of the static hydro tester is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹了靜水壓試驗機的液壓工作原理。

sentences.english: If the water pressure is not enough, it may lead to inductor coil gasifying and emitting heat.
sentences.chinese: 如果水壓不夠，就會造成感應器線圈氣化，發熱。

sentences.english: Hereby the fresh water should be used in the pressure test.
sentences.chinese: 因此水壓試驗時只能用潔淨的水進行。

sentences.english: Hydrostatic test plugs will be provided for all the spring loaded safety valves.
sentences.chinese: 每隻彈簧安全閥都帶有水壓試驗堵塞及試驗壓緊工具。

sentences.english: To renew defective rivets and conduct water test in following places.
sentences.chinese: 更換下列各處損壞的柳釘並做水壓試驗。

sentences.english: It exerts pressure in all directions and is called water pressure.
sentences.chinese: 它向所有的方向都施加壓力，這叫水壓。

sentences.english: In this paper, a dual-cylinder water hydraulic synchronous system with position feedback was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種帶位置反饋的水壓比例雙缸同步控制系統。

sentences.english: You must wait until the water inside the car equalizes the pressure of the outside water.
sentences.chinese: 您必須等到車內水壓和外界壓力達到均衡。
